Method Detail

getAvailableService

public static <T> T getAvailableService(org.osgi.framework.BundleContext bundleContext,
                                        java.lang.Class<T> requestedServiceType)
                             throws java.lang.ClassCastException
Deprecated. 
Gets the currently avail service of requested type from the bundle contexts service registry using the full qualified class name of requested service type as Id.

Type Parameters:
T - The local type var to identify the service instance.
Parameters:
bundleContext - The context that registry is to be searched.
requestedServiceType - The requested service type.
Returns:
The currently avail service or null if currently not avail.
Throws:
java.lang.ClassCastException - If a found service registered on the full qualified class name is not assignable to the requested type.
